name: cacheDelete
description: Deletes a single element from the cache.

params.name: id
params.description: The id of the element to delete, can also contain a "," (not used as separator)

params.name: throwOnError
params.description: Define if the functions throws an exception when the element does not exist (default is false)

params.name: cacheName
params.description: Definition of the cache used by name, when not set the "default Object Cache" defined in Lucee Administrator is used instead
